plot: Army Officer Carla Williamson returns from fighting the Iraq War with PTSD (Post Traumatic Stress Disorder) and has a difficult time readjusting to her life at home. The PTSD is only half the story, the cause is the other.
title: Carla
plot_es: Army Officer Carla Williamson returns from fighting the Iraq War with PTSD (Post Traumatic Stress Disorder) and has a difficult time readjusting to her life at home. The PTSD is only half the story, the cause is the other.
plot_en: Army Officer Carla Williamson returns from fighting the Iraq War with PTSD (Post Traumatic Stress Disorder) and has a difficult time readjusting to her life at home. The PTSD is only half the story, the cause is the other.
